mentionedBy.name: BlackLine Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Leverages AI and automation across order-to-cash and record-to-report lifecycle. Particularly strong in AR, credit, collections. Also delivers robust financial close automation including auto-reconciliation and task orchestration.
